a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of pneumonia deaths in elderly by risk factor, World
The estimated annual number of deaths from pneumonia and other lower respiratory diseases in people aged 70
and older. This is shown as the number caused by each risk factor.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: Risk factors are not mutually exclusive. The sum of deaths attributed to each risk factor can exceed the total number of deaths.
